subject: The device just not connect
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I just receive the pedal Pro. And connect with the pc. 1st time work very
well, I check on simsonn manager and saw every work. But after I change the
usb cable to another usb gatr. It show disconnected and canâ€™t do anyhing.

Please help me what to do

conversations.body_text: Hi nguyen wan,    We recommend connecting the device to the rear USB 3.0 (blue) port of your computer, or using a powered USB hub with independent supply, as stable power is required.
